publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2667 Christine Grahame: Freedom of Information (Scotland) Bill-That the Justice 1 Committee considers the Freedom of Information (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 1 to 3, schedule 1, sections 4 to 8, sections 10 and 11, sections 14 to 42, schedule 2, sections 43 to 54, schedule 3, sections 55 to 61, section 9, sections 12 and 13, sections 62 to 73.

S1M-2667 Christine Grahame: Freedom of Information (Scotland) Bill-That the Justice 1 Committee considers the Freedom of Information (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 1 to 3, schedule 1, sections 4 to 8, sections 10 and 11, sections 14 to 42, schedule 2, sections 43 to 54, schedule 3, sections 55 to 61, section 9, sections 12 and 13, sections 62 to 73.
